summary: Premium Vedic astrology consultation and online course website for SHRIMADHAV ASTROLOGY by Astrologer Nishant Madhav. Features a light ivory/warm cream background with gold (#D4AF37) and saffron (#FF9933) accents, subtle mandala patterns, and a luxurious spiritual aesthetic. Includes Hero, About, Consultation Services, Courses, and Contact sections. All booking/enrollment links point to external Google Forms (no internal payment or booking system).
architectural_notes: All consultation and course buttons open external Google Forms in a new tab — no internal booking or payment system
Design: light ivory/cream background, gold (#D4AF37) accents, saffron (#FF9933) highlights, serif headings, modern body font, mandala patterns
Fully mobile responsive layout; SEO optimized and fast loading

existing_features.title: Apply a global visual theme across the entire site: light ivory/warm cream background (#FAF6EF or similar), gold accent color #D4AF37, saffron highlight color #FF9933, elegant serif font (e.g., Playfair Display or similar) for all headings, clean modern sans-serif font (e.g., Inter or Lato) for body text. Add subtle celestial/mandala SVG decorative patterns in the background. Ensure the layout is fully mobile responsive.

Build a full-width Hero section at the top of the page with: site name 'SHRIMADHAV ASTROLOGY' and tagline 'By Astrologer Nishant Madhav' in the header/nav area; headline 'Awaken to the Wisdom Written in Your Stars'; subheadline 'Personalized Vedic astrology consultations and transformational courses to align your life with divine timing.'; a saffron CTA button labeled 'Book Consultation' that opens https://forms.gle/GSnWKXhVAdfjjjRx6 in a new tab; a gold-outlined secondary button labeled 'Explore Courses' that smooth-scrolls to the Courses section.

Build an About section introducing Astrologer Nishant Madhav. Include a brief biography paragraph, a list of expertise areas (Birth Chart Analysis, Nakshatra System, Dasha & Predictive Astrology, Career & Marriage Guidance), and a mission statement focused on clarity, dharma, and spiritual alignment. Use an avatar/icon placeholder for the astrologer's photo.

Each card should display a service title, a brief description, and a 'Book Now' button that opens https://forms.gle/GSnWKXhVAdfjjjRx6 in a new tab. No internal checkout.
